blog.name: radical-conceptussy
blog.title: Radical Conceptussy
blog.description: Just a nerd trying to find their way and a 100% proud straight ally for Daniel Howell

summary: Hearing him say these words again are sadly really impacting how I feel about some members of the phandom in their recent...
body:
Hearing him say these words again are sadly really impacting how I feel about some members of the phandom in their recent behaviour towards him.

Please remember that Dan is just like the rest of us. He is also a human with real feelings, thoughts and emotions.

What you choose to say or how you choose to treat him says a lot about you.

Don’t treat him or anyone else in a way that you yourself wouldn’t want to be treated.
